Can_Damage_Crystal_Guardian: UPSLASH | LEFTSLASH | RIGHTSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (CYCLONE | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS + (CYCLONE | GREATSLASH) + (DREAMNAIL + (SPELLS | FOCUS + SPORESHROOM | GLOWINGWOMB) | WEAVERSONG)
COMBAT[Shrumal_Ogre]: SIDESLASH | UPSLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | FULLDASHSLASH | ANYDASHSLASH + DASHMASTER + OBSCURESKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS
COMBAT[Glimback]: UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | SPELLS
COMBAT[Durandoo]: ACID + UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | (FIREBALL + $CASTSPELL[2] | SCREAM + $CASTSPELL) + (PRECISEMOVEMENT | $TAKEDAMAGE) | 6DAMAGE | 5DAMAGE + PRECISEMOVEMENT
COMBAT[Nightmare_King]: (FIREBALL>1 | QUAKE>1 | SCREAM>1 | (MILDCOMBATSKIPS | CURSED) + SPELLS>1) + (FULLDASH | ANYDASH + MILDCOMBATSKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS) + NAILCOMBAT
COMBAT[Radiance]: FULLDASH + (FULLSHADOWDASH | QUAKE) + (FIREBALL>1 + UPSLASH | SCREAM>1 + UPSLASH | CURSED + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + UPSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + (UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
COMBAT[Pantheon_4]: AERIALMINIBOSS + (FOCUS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS) + Can_Damage_Crystal_Guardian + FULLDASH + (FULLSHADOWDASH | QUAKE) + (FIREBALL>1 + UPSLASH | SCREAM>1 + UPSLASH | CURSED + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + UPSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + (UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
COMBAT[Pantheon_5]: AERIALMINIBOSS + FOCUS + Can_Damage_Crystal_Guardian + FULLDASH + (FULLSHADOWDASH | QUAKE) + (FIREBALL>1 + UPSLASH | SCREAM>1 + UPSLASH | CURSED + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + UPSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + (UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
